title: Crime Alert 12.03.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.03.21
description:
Cops responding to a burglary in progress find a grizzly scene. A woman throws hot soup after the plastic lid on her soup melts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
